titleStmt.title: The treasure of true loue or A liuely description of the loue of Christ vnto his spouse, whom in loue he hath clensed in his blood from sinne, and made a royall priesthood vnto his Father. / By Thomas Tuke, preacher of the word..
titleStmt.author: Tuke, Thomas, d. 1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Creede, and are to be solde by Thomas Archer.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded print, with considerable loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
